p.s: The first shot of Chris is a medium shot of him smiling and doing handshakes.
It shows us, that he is popular and probably nice.
We then see Starr looking at him and also smiling.
Because of this you can see, that she still likes him.
She especially looks at his sneakers and thinks, that she has similar ones.
This is a connection she draws between them and it also shows that she likes and misses Chris.
Then Chris is shown again, moving down the hall and when he notices Starr the camera turns to her.
Starr looks away and signalizes that she doesn't want to talk.
Here you can see that Starr must have some serious problems with Chris, because she doesn't want to talk to him, altoughalthough she really likes him.
Then Chris moves determined to Starr, which shows that she is also important to him and he wants her back.
The next shot is a close up of StarrsStarr's face where Chris puts his headphones on her ears.
First she smiles but then she takes them off and turns around.
At least Starr now talks to Chris and as Chris starts saying how important she is to him, the camera gets closer to them.
This supports the importance of this part of their conversation.
While Starr mostly looks down or to the side, showing that she is still annoyed and doesn't really wants to talk, Chris directly looks at her, which shows again how much he likes her.
When Chris changes the topic to his music, the camera isn't as close anymore.
Starr starts to smile and Chris plugs the headphones off and dances in the hallway to the loud music, which makes Starr laugh.
This shows, that Chris can distract and entertain Starr with his music that she even forgets their problems and is happy.
She then pulls Chris to an empty room where they kiss.
This scene shows the change of StarrsStarr's feelings for Chris.

In the beginning she is angry at him and doesn't want to talk but Chris makes her so happy with the things he does, for example dancing or showing her the music, that she realizes how much she loves him and even pulls him aside to kiss.
All in all you can say that Chris and his sometimes silly behaviour is good for Starr because he makes her happy and distracts her from her problems, especially Khalil's death.
